member.summary: How to fill in the leader.

member.summary: The minimum, optimum, and maximum length of an fo:leader.

member.summary: The overall thickness of the rule.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.FoLeader.Color

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Graphics.FoExternalGraphic
member.summary: A graphic where the graphics data resides outside of the XML result tree in the fo namespace.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Graphics.FoExternalGraphic.Src
member.summary: The URI-specification to locate an external resource such as image/graphic data to be included as the content of this object, or color-profile data.

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Graphics.FoExternalGraphic.Width
member.summary: The content width of boxes generated by block-level and replaced elements. This property does not apply to non-replaced inline-level elements. The width of a non-replaced inline element's boxes is that of the rendered content within them (before any relative offset of children). Recall that inline boxes flow into line boxes. The width of line boxes is given by their containing block, but may be shorted by the presence of floats.

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Graphics.FoExternalGraphic.Height
member.summary: The content height of boxes generated by block-level and replaced elements. This property does not apply to non-replaced inline-level elements. The height of a non-replaced inline element's boxes is given by the element's (possibly inherited) 'line-height' value.

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Graphics.FoExternalGraphic.ContentWidth
member.summary: The content-width of some object (e.g., an external graphic). If the value is a percentage, the value of this property is the percentage applied to the intrinsic width.

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Graphics.FoExternalGraphic.ContentHeight
member.summary: The content-height of some object (e.g., an external graphic). If the value is a percentage, the value of this property is the percentage applied to the intrinsic height.

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Graphics.FoExternalGraphic.Scaling
member.summary: Whether scaling needs to preserve the intrinsic aspect ratio.

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Graphics.FoExternalGraphic.ScalingMethod
member.summary: Indicates a preference in the scaling/sizing tradeoff to be used when formatting bitmapped graphics.

member.name: M:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Graphics.FoExternalGraphic.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance with default options.

member.name: M:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Graphics.FoExternalGraphic.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance with the specified .

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Graphics.FoScaling
member.summary: Whether scaling needs to preserve the intrinsic aspect ratio.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Graphics.FoScaling.Uniform
member.summary: Scaling should preserve the aspect ratio.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Graphics.FoScaling.NonUniform
member.summary: Scaling need not preserve the aspect ratio.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Graphics.FoScalingMethod
member.summary: Indicates a preference in the scaling/sizing tradeoff to be used when formatting bitmapped graphics.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Graphics.FoScalingMethod.Auto
member.summary: The User Agent is free to choose either resampling, integer scaling, or any other scaling method.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Graphics.FoScalingMethod.IntegerPixels
member.summary: The User Agent should scale the image such that each pixel in the original image is scaled to the nearest integer number of device-pixels that yields an image less-then-or-equal-to the image size derived from the content-height, content-width, and scaling properties.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Graphics.FoScalingMethod.ResampleAnyMethod
member.summary: The User Agent should resample the supplied image to provide an image that fills the size derived from the content-height, content-width, and scaling properties. The user agent may use any sampling method.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Pages.FoPageSequence
member.summary: Specifies how to create a (sub-)sequence of pages within a document; for example, a chapter of a report. The content of these pages comes from flow children of the fo:page-sequence. Specifies that only the children of fo:markers that are descendants of any fo:flow within the containing fo:page-sequence may be retrieved by this fo:retrieve-marker.

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Pages.FoPageSequence.MasterReference
member.summary: The names need not be unique, but may not be empty and must refer to a master-name that exists within the document.

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Pages.FoPageSequence.Id
member.summary: An identifier unique within all objects in the result tree with the fo: namespace. It allows references to this formatting object by other objects.

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Pages.FoPageSequence.StaticContent
member.summary: A sequence or a tree of formatting objects that is to be presented in a single region or repeated in like-named regions on one or more pages in the page-sequence. Its common use is for repeating or running headers and footers.

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Pages.FoPageSequence.Flows
member.summary: A sequence of flow objects that provides the flowing text content that is distributed into pages.

member.summary: Identifies a region within a simple-page-master.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Regions.FoRegionAfter
member.summary: A viewport that is located on the "after" side of fo:region-body region.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Regions.FoRegionBefore
member.summary: A viewport that is located on the "before" side of fo:region-body region.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Regions.FoRegionBody
member.summary: A viewport/reference pair that is located in the "center" of the fo:simple-page-master.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Regions.FoRegionCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of elements.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoDisplayAlign
member.summary: Enum class indicating the alignment, in the block-progression-direction, of the areas that are the children of a reference-area.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoDisplayAlign.Auto
member.summary: If the "relative-align" property applies to this formatting object the "relative-align" property is used. If not, this value is treated as if "before" had been specified.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoDisplayAlign.Before
member.summary: The before-edge of the allocation-rectangle of the first child area is placed coincident with the before-edge of the content-rectangle of the reference-area.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoDisplayAlign.Center
member.summary: The child areas are placed such that the distance between the before-edge of the allocation-rectangle of the first child area and the before-edge of the content-rectangle of the reference-area is the same as the distance between the after-edge of the allocation-rectangle of the last child area and the after-edge of the content-rectangle of the reference-area.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoDisplayAlign.After
member.summary: The after-edge of the allocation-rectangle of the last child area is placed coincident with the after-edge of the content-rectangle of the reference-area.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoFontStyle
member.summary: Enum class representing the font style of an element. Only supports and for now.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoFontWeight
member.summary: Enum class representing the font weight of an element. Only supports and for now.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoKeepTogether
member.summary: Enum class indicating the keep-together conditions on formatting objects.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoKeepTogether.Always
member.summary: Imposes a keep-together condition with strength "always" in the appropriate context.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoLeaderPattern
member.summary: How to fill in the leader.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoLeaderPattern.Space
member.summary: Blank space.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoLeaderPattern.Rule
member.summary: A rule. If this choice is selected, the "rule-thickness" and "rule-style" properties are used to set the leader's style.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoLeaderPattern.Dots
member.summary: A repeating sequence of dots. The choice of dot character is dependent on the user agent.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoLeaderPattern.UseContent
member.summary: A repeating pattern as specified by the children of the fo:leader.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoPageBreakBefore
member.summary: A potential page break location is typically under the influence of the parent element's page-break-inside property, the page-break-after property of the preceding element, and the page-break-before property of the following element. When these properties have values other than , the values , , and take precedence over . See the section on allowed page breaks for the exact rules on how these properties may force or suppress a page break.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoPageBreakBefore.Inherit
member.summary: Inherits the value from a parent or ancestor.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoPageBreakBefore.Auto
member.summary: Neither force nor forbid a page break before (after, inside) the generated box.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoPageBreakBefore.Always
member.summary: Always force a page break before (after) the generated box.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoPageBreakBefore.Avoid
member.summary: Avoid a page break before (after, inside) the generated box.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoPageBreakBefore.Left
member.summary: Force one or two page breaks before (after) the generated box so that the next page is formatted as a left page.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoPageBreakBefore.Right
member.summary: Force one or two page breaks before (after) the generated box so that the next page is formatted as a right page.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoTextAlign
member.summary: Enum class indicating how inline content of a block should be aligned.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoTextAlign.Start
member.summary: Specifies that the content is to be aligned on the start-edge in the inline-progression-direction.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoTextAlign.Center
member.summary: Specifies that the content is to be centered in the inline-progression-direction.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoTextAlign.End
member.summary: Specifies that the content is to be aligned on the end-edge in the inline-progression-direction.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoTextAlign.Justify
member.summary: Specifies that the contents is to be expanded to fill the available width in the inline-progression-direction.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoTextAlign.Inside
member.summary: If the page binding edge is on the start-edge, the alignment will be start. If the binding is the end-edge, the alignment will be end. If neither, use start alignment.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoTextAlign.Outside
member.summary: If the page binding edge is on the start-edge, the alignment will be end. If the binding is the end-edge, the alignment will be start. If neither, use end alignment.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoTextAlign.Left
member.summary: Interpreted as text-align='start'.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoTextAlign.Right
member.summary: Interpreted as text-align='end'.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoTextDecoration
member.summary: Enum class representing the text decoration of an element.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoTextDecoration.None
member.summary: Produces no text decoration.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoTextDecoration.Underline
member.summary: Each line of text is underlined.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoTextDecoration.Overline
member.summary: Each line of text has a line above it.

member.name: F:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Styles.FoTextDecoration.LineThrough
member.summary: Each line of text has a line through the middle

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Tables.FoTableCell
member.summary: A table cell.

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Tables.FoTableCell.Colspan
member.summary: Alias .

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Tables.FoTableCell.NumberColumnsSpanned
member.summary: The number of columns which this cell spans in the column-progression-direction starting with the current column.

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Tables.FoTableCell.Rowspan
member.summary: Alias of .

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Tables.FoTableCell.NumberRowsSpanned
member.summary: The number of rows which this cell spans in the row-progression-direction starting with the current row.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Tables.FoTableCellCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of elements.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Tables.FoTableColumn
member.summary: Characteristics applicable to table cells that have the same column and span.

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Tables.FoTableColumn.ColumnNumber
member.summary: Specifies the column-number of the table cells that may use properties from this fo:table-column formatting object by using the from-table-column() function. The initial value is 1 plus the column-number of the previous table-column, if there is a previous table-column, and otherwise 1.

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Tables.FoTableColumn.ColumnWidth
member.summary: The width of the column whose value is given by the "column-number" property. This property, if present, is ignored if the "number-columns-spanned" property is greater than 1. The "column-width" property must be specified for every column, unless the automatic table layout is used.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Tables.FoTableColumnCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of elements.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Tables.FoTableRow
member.summary: Groups table-cells into rows.

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Tables.FoTableRow.KeepTogether
member.summary: Imposes keep-together conditions on formatting objects.

member.name: P:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Tables.FoTableRow.KeepTogetherWithinColumn
member.summary: Imposes keep-together conditions on formatting objects.

member.name: T:Limbo.FormattingObjects.Tables.FoTableRowCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of elements.
